page.title: 15GODBOLTS FARM, MARKS TEY.
page.content: Mr Millen has lived in Marks Tey and worked Godbolts Farm for 9 years.Mr Millen is also a butcher.He owns 5 acres of land.He has about 220 cows each year.He has plain black ( Lincolns ), black and white ( Fresians and Herefords )and all brown ones ( Sussex ). They come at four days old and are weanid by Mrs Millen. They use a lot of food and 20,000 bails of straw each year. When they are ready at 10 months they are killed.Five are killed each week, three for his own shop in Tiptree and two for the butchers at Marks Tey. They have one ram, fifteen ewes and twentytwo lambs. The lambs also go to his shop. They will be sold in one week. Darren, Mr Millens son breeds rabbits for the table. Mrs Millen bakes 400 pies a week for the shop.
